LanguageData.WorkbenchConnect.LinkWorkbenchDesc: Link this workbench to other workbenches of the same type to share bills.
LanguageData.WorkbenchConnect.UnlinkWorkbenchDesc: Unlink this workbench from its current group.
LanguageData.WorkbenchConnect.SelectLinkedDesc: Select all workbenches linked to this one.
LanguageData.WorkbenchConnect.BillReservedByOtherPawn: Bill is being worked on by another pawn
LanguageData.WorkbenchConnect.LinkDisabledSelectTwo: Select at least two workbenches of the same type
